Class TicTacToe

java.lang.Object
TicTacToe
public class TicTacToe extends Object
Class containing series of static methods to be used with manipulating Tic Tac Toe board configurations. Includes methods for converting configurations and checking if they are valid or winning positions.

  • Method Details

    • valid

      public static boolean valid(char[][] board)
      Checks whether a given board configuration is a valid TTT position that has the potential to be a winning position: checks that there are at least three of one character, and only a difference of one in frequency between x's and o's
      Parameters:
      board - the configuration to be checked
      Returns:
      Whether the board position has the potential to be a valid winning position

    • boardToString

      public static String boardToString(char[][] b)
      Connverts a board configuration to a String and returns it
      Parameters:
      b - the board configuration to be converted to a String
      Returns:
      a String representation of b

    • stringToBoard

      public static char[][] stringToBoard(String board)
      Takes in a String representation of a board configuration and returns the a char[][] equivalent
      Parameters:
      board - the String representation of the char[][] board configuration
      Returns:
      the char[][] board configuration equivalent of the input String

    • whichLetter

      public static char whichLetter(char ch)
      Returns the char equivalent of a given number char from {0-2}: 1=x, 2=o, 0=' '
      Parameters:
      ch - the number (as a char) to be checked
      Returns:
      the associated TTT char for the given number ch

    • makeBoard

      public static char[][] makeBoard(String s)
      Takes in a String representation of a board configuration and returns the a char[][] equivalent
      Parameters:
      board - the String representation of the char[][] board configuration
      Returns:
      the char[][] board configuration equivalent of the input String

    • fillValues

      public static String[] fillValues()
      Returns a String[] array containing every board configuration as each a 9-char string composed of 0s, 1s, and 2s
      Returns:
      String[] with all potential board configurations as 9-char Strings of 0s, 1s, and 2s

    • diagonalWin

      public static boolean diagonalWin(char[][] board)
      Checks if a given board configuration has a three-in-a-row diagonally for either x's or o's
      Parameters:
      board - the board configuration to be analyzed
      Returns:
      whether the given configuration has a diagonal win

    • rowWin

      public static boolean rowWin(char[][] board)
      Checks if a given board configuration has exactly one three-in-a-row win horizontally across a row
      Parameters:
      board - the board configuration to be analyzed
      Returns:
      whether the board configuration has exactly one horizontal win

    • colWin

      public static boolean colWin(char[][] board)
      Checks if a given board configuration has exactly one three-in-a-row win vertically across a column
      Parameters:
      board - the board configuration to be analyzed
      Returns:
      whether the board configuration has exactly one vertical win

    • isWin

      public static boolean isWin(char[][] b)
      Checks whether a given board configuration is a valid position and has exactly one three-in-a-row win
      Parameters:
      b - the board configuration to be analyzed
      Returns:
      whether the board is valid and has exactly one win

    • isWinString

      public static String isWinString(char[][] b)
      Checks whether a given board configuration is a valid position and has exactly one three-in-a-row win. Specifies whether the win was vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, or if it was not a win
      Parameters:
      b - the board configuration to be analyzed
      Returns:
      "loser" if there is no win, otherwise will specify "Row", "col", or "Dia" depending on the type of win

    • isWin

      public static boolean isWin(String s)
      Checks whether a given board configuration (given in String form) is a valid position and has exactly one three-in-a-row win
      Parameters:
      b - the board configuration (in String form) to be analyzed
      Returns:
      whether the board is valid and has exactly one win

    • isWinString

      public static String isWinString(String s)
      Checks whether a given board configuration (given in String form) is a valid position and has exactly one three-in-a-row win. Specifies whether the win was vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, or if it was not a win
      Parameters:
      b - the board configuration (in String form) to be analyzed
      Returns:
      "loser" if there is no win, otherwise will specify "Row", "col", or "Dia" depending on the type of win

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Has a board configuration and passes it though a series of tests to observe what each win-check method returns when it is passed to them. Prints the behavior of the methods
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments to be passed to this method. Ignored in this implementation.
